elements.text: Secure federated AI solution for multi-hospital training
Institution Name: AJ Institute of Engineering & Technology Mangalore, Karnataka

IDEA:
We propose a Federated Learning (FL) framework where each hospital trains a local AI model on-site and only encrypted model updates are shared to a central aggregator. No raw patient data ever leaves hospital servers.
USE CASES:
1. Multi-Hospital Disease Detection
 Training a unified model for disease detection (e.g., cancer, pneumonia) across multiple hospitals without data sharing.
2. Treatment Response Prediction
 Predicts likely treatment success based on demographic and clinical patterns learned from decentralized datasets.
3. Privacy-Compliant Medical Research
 Allows collaboration with pharma companies & research institutions without exposing patient data.

Each hospital trains an AI model on its private patient data without sharing raw records.
 Differential Privacy and Homomorphic Encryption ensure that individual patient data cannot be reconstructed.
Federated Aggregation
 The central server aggregates encrypted updates to create a global model.
Handling Non-IID Data
 FedProx algorithm stabilizes training across hospitals with varying demographics and data distributions.
 Each hospital receives both the global model and a personalized version adapted to its local dataset.

Frontend: React
Backend: Python
Deep Learning Framework: PyTorch
API Layer: FastAPI
Federated Learning Framework: TensorFlow Federated
FL Algorithms: FedAvg, FedProx
Privacy and Security: Differential Privacy, Homomorphic Encryption, SMPC, SSL–TLS
Deployment: Docker + Kubernetes
Model Type: CNNs for imaging, Transformers for EHR
Data Standard: FHIR

Dual-Layer Privacy Protection: Differential Privacy at the hospital level + secure aggregation with Homomorphic Encryption/SMPC ensures patient data is never exposed.
Non-IID Data Handling: Uses FedProx to stabilize training across hospitals with different patient demographics (pediatric, geriatric, specialty hospitals).
Personalized Federated Models: Each hospital receives a customized local model built on top of a global model for improved accuracy.
Attack Resistance: Strong defense against membership inference and gradient inversion attacks through calibrated privacy noise.
Scalable Multi-Hospital Collaboration: Works seamlessly across distributed hospital networks using Docker + Kubernetes.
Institution Name: AJ Institute of Engineering & Technology Mangalore, Karnataka
